campaign.title: WE ARE CURRENTLY RUNNING A CAMPAIGN:

video.subtitle: WATCH OUR WINNING VIDEO
video.title: STOP SEXUAL ABUSE
video.content: In this video, we focus on the importance of people coming together to create a safer environment for everyone. We support discussions and collaboration against sexual abuse and harassment for positive change. This video marks the beginning of our commitment to achieve a fairer and safer future for all.

goals.title: OUR GOALS:
goals.first: To build a community of people who stand against sexual abuse and harassment
goals.third: To increase penalties for sexual abuse and harassment without conditions
goals.fourth: Fair "compensation" for sexual abuse and harassment

reportage.title: IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO LEARN MORE ABOUT US, A REPORT WAS FILMED ABOUT US ON INTERNATIONAL WOMEN'S DAY 2024.
reportage.content: On International Women's Day, we decided to distribute flowers and leaflets to random women to draw attention to the issue of sexual harassment. We collaborate with lawyers and psychologists and actively promote respect for women from a young age through our activities.
